live_updates: Local Officials and Fortis BC have restricted access to the site due to ongoing wildfire activity. Shaw Technicians are awaiting for site clearance before further repairs can take place. We will provide updates as available. Thank you for your patience.
Due to the wildfire damage, our technicians are unable to proceed with work due to safety concerns in the area. Further updates will be posted as the situation develops.
39974.summary: Some customers in Grand Forks and surrounding areas are experiencing an interruption to Internet and Television services due to Severe Fire Damage in the NK'Mip Creek Region (K52061) 80 Km away. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39974.title: July 27 – Grand Forks (Christina Lake, Midway) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
